modDescription:
[HUD](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-hud-mod/)/UI mod for A19.

## Changelog

* **_(new)_** Updated for A19.1
* The day of the blood moon was not red at the top; now it is. It turns red after 8 am as per vanilla.

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1i614qmwG0ELVi7EoBo-CHuQLQfrVC4zi)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/20771-hud-for-a-19/).

**Credits:** [h0tr0d](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/h0tr0d/)
